bioimg.segment.read_bbox¶

bioimg.segment.read_bbox(df, rmax, cmax, columns=['ymin', 'xmin', 'ymax', 'xmax'], pad=0)¶
Parameters
dfDataFrame

DataFrame of RegionProperties

rmaxint

Maximum height of an image

cmaxint

Maximum width of an image

columnslist

List of column names. Should specify the order of xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax

padint

Padding value for the bounding boxes

Returns
bboxlist

List of bounding box coordinates in (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax) tuples

Next topic
